{"id":502913971,"lang":"cpp","time":"3 weeks, 5 days","timestamp":1622811245,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"16 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/502913971/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Toeplitz Matrix","memory":"18.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isToeplitzMatrix(vector<vector<int>>& matrix) {\n        map<int, int> seen;\n        for (int r = 0; r < matrix.size(); r++) {\n            for (int c = 0; c < matrix[0].size(); c++) {\n                int val = matrix[r][c];\n                if (seen.find(r - c) == seen.end()) {\n                    seen[r - c] = val; continue;\n                }\n                if (val != seen[r - c]) return false;\n            }\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n};\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"toeplitz-matrix"}
